message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the lead, you can't refuse!
I'll take the lead, you can't refuse... back!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'm not desperate yet, but I'll give you a chance!
You're getting closer, but I'm not done yet!
I'm not giving up yet, let's try again!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting bold!
I'm not giving up, I'll try again!
You're running out of time, I'm taking control!
I'm not giving up, I'll try one more time!
This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
